title: Data Sources
text:
Statewide ballot area polygons were downloaded from Utah’s Open Data Portal:

Dataset: Utah VISTA Ballot Areas
URL: https://opendata.gis.utah.gov/datasets/utah::utah-vista-ballot-areas/about
Original file: VistaBallotAreas_-1176372527926423573.geojson

Processing: * Load the statewide GeoJSON * Filter to Utah County using CountyID == 25: * Keep only required fields: ['CountyID', 'PrecinctID', 'SubPrecinctID', 'geometry'] * Reproject for web mapping: WGS84 (EPSG:4326) * Lightly simplify geometry for performance: tolerance = 0.0001
Output: data/geo/utah_county_precincts.min.geojson

title: Welcome: What This Blog Is For
text:
This is a lightweight place to share Utah County–specific political data and practical strategy.

Keep posts short
Link sources when you can
End with one clear takeaway

title: Quick Metric: Contact → Show Rate
text:
A simple weekly check: how many scheduled voters actually show up (events, canvass shifts, trainings).
If the show rate drops, try: - confirm the day before - send a map + time estimate - offer a buddy option (bring a friend)

title: Data Sources
text:
Statewide ballot area polygons were downloaded from Utah’s Open Data Portal:

Dataset: Utah VISTA Ballot Areas
URL: https://opendata.gis.utah.gov/datasets/utah::utah-vista-ballot-areas/about
Original file: VistaBallotAreas_-1176372527926423573.geojson

Processing:

Load the statewide GeoJSON
Filter to Utah County using CountyID == 25:
Keep only required fields: ['CountyID', 'PrecinctID', 'SubPrecinctID', 'geometry']
Reproject for web mapping: WGS84 (EPSG:4326)
Lightly simplify geometry for performance: tolerance = 0.0001

Output: data/geo/utah_county_precincts.min.geojson
